sections.title: Mage of the Third Eye (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Mage of the Third Eye class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Mages of the third eye gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.
keywords: mage of the third eye proficiencies

sections.title: Mystic Pedagogue ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Adds half class level as bonus to Spellcraft checks for learning wizard spells or crafting magical items.

sections.title: Third Eye (Su) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Grants additional daily uses of Eldritch Eye feat and allows using aid another to boost adjacent wizard's caster level and concentration checks while the eye is open.

sections.title: Artificer’s Touch (Sp) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Expends hand of the apprentice use to activate the Artifice domain's artificer's touch power using caster level as cleric level.

sections.title: Scholiast (Sp) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Allows access to wizard school powers from other schools by expending hand of the apprentice uses, with additional schools gained at higher levels.

sections.title: Arcane Architect ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Creates constructs in half time and can apply Extend Spell and Widen Spell metamagic to conjuration creation spells with reduced or eliminated level increases.

sections.title: Improved Third Eye (Sp) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Activates Eldritch Eye as move action and can add arcane sight or see invisibility effects by expending hand of the apprentice uses.

sections.title: Extradimensional Extension (Su) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Doubles duration of spells creating extradimensional spaces or moving through Ethereal Plane without increasing spell level, like permanent Extend Spell.

sections.title: Call for Aid (Su) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Sacrifices prepared spell to teleport bound creatures (familiars, constructs, dominated creatures, etc.) with range based on spell level sacrificed.

sections.title: Greater Third Eye (Sp) (Mage of the Third Eye)
sections.description: Activates Eldritch Eye as swift action and can gain greater arcane sight or true seeing effects by expending multiple hand of the apprentice uses.
